36#include <config.h>
37
38#include <krb5/roken.h>
39
40/*
41 * Write datablob to a filename, don't care about errors.
42 */
43
44ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION void ROKEN_LIB_CALL
45rk_dumpdata (const char *filename, const void *buf, size_t size)
46{
47 int fd;
48
49 fd = open(filename, O_WRONLY|O_TRUNC|O_CREAT, 0640);
50 if (fd < 0)
51 return;
52 net_write(fd, buf, size);
53 close(fd);
54}
55
56/*
57 * Read all data from a filename, care about errors.
58 */
59
60ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION int ROKEN_LIB_CALL
61rk_undumpdata(const char *filename, void **buf, size_t *size)
62{
63 struct stat sb;
64 int fd, ret;
65 ssize_t sret;
66
67 *buf = NULL;
68
69 fd = open(filename, O_RDONLY, 0);
70 if (fd < 0)
71 return errno;
72 if (fstat(fd, &sb) != 0){
73 ret = errno;
74 goto out;
75 }
76 *buf = malloc(sb.st_size);
77 if (*buf == NULL) {
78 ret = ENOMEM;
79 goto out;
80 }
81 *size = sb.st_size;
82
83 sret = net_read(fd, *buf, *size);
84 if (sret < 0)
85 ret = errno;
86 else if (sret != (ssize_t)*size)
87 ret = EINVAL;
88 else
89 ret = 0;
90
91 out:
92 if (ret) {
93 free(*buf);
94 *buf = NULL;
95 }
96 close(fd);
97 return ret;
98}
